ProductInfo.Features:
GW3016HD: 16CH 960H/FD1 video input DVR; HDMI Preview Resolution; Support 8 HDDs; 16 full channel real-time playback; Support HDMI/VGA/BNC/SPOT/Loop Simultaneous Output; Support 3G; Support PTZ, Manual Alarm, Alarm In/Out
GW108M: Professional 1/3" Effio CCD Camera; 700 TVL; 2.8~12mm Varifocal lens; 36pcs IR LED; 98 ft. IR Distance; Vandal proof; WDR(Wide Dynamic Range); OSD Menu.
GW2011WD: Professional Outdoor IR dome camera; 1/3" SONY CCD; 700 TVL; Varifocal 4~9mm manual lens; WDR(Wide Dynamic Range); OSD Menu; Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on); Waterproof.
Package Includes: 1xGW3016HD DVR with 8T HD; 1xGWLED19IN: Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 8xGW108M: 1/3" Effio-E CCD Camera; 8xGW2011WD: 1/3" CCD Camera;
Package Includes: 1xGW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box; 16 x GW082: Power pigtail; 16 x GW132: Power pigtail; 32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc. 16CHE6 16-Channel Professional DVR Security Camera System (Black and White)
